activities: Rigzone, a Dice Holdings Inc. service, is a leading online resource for the oil and gas industry delivering content, data, advertising and career services.  Dedicated to bringing upstream oil and gas news and data, including in-depth information on exploration, drilling and production markets to organizations tackling the energy challenge, its online community of highly-skilled and experienced energy professionals is unmatched.  Our websites operates as an online marketplace where employers and recruiters find and recruit prospective employees, and where professionals find relevant job opportunities and information to further their career. Our website services may require registration or login prior to access, this is to help maintain the confidentiality of personal information.  We will collect information about user tastes and preferences both when a user tells us what these are and by analysis of customer traffic.  If a user enters a contest or promotion we will ask for his/her name, address and e-mail address. This is so we can administer the contest and inform the winners. Participation in these surveys or contests is completely voluntary and therefore users have a choice whether or not to disclose this information.  We use information collected about users to personalize their visits to our Website and recommend goods or services. We also use the information to help us develop the design and layout of our Website to improve our sites to that they are as useful and enjoyable as possible.  Sometimes we might use the information to inform users about new services on or functionality changes to our Website. If a user does not wish to receive this information, he/she should send an e-mail to privacy@rigzone.com.  Our confidential resume database enables users to anonymously and confidentially profile their skills and experience to recruiters.
corpofftitle1: Vice President Business & Legal Affairs and General Counsel
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
